LanguageData.NR_MaterialEnergy_MaterialMachine.label: Material Converter
LanguageData.NR_MaterialEnergy_MaterialMachine.descri: It converts from material to energy, energy to material. Those converted into energy can be generated from energy.
LanguageData.NR_MaterialEnergy_Energy.label: Material Energy
LanguageData.NR_MaterialEnergy_Energy.description: It can be converted into a material with a Material Converter.
